Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 95th/Dan Ryan
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing due to police activity at 95th/Dan Ryan. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing due to police activity at 95th/Dan Ryan. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
